entry.title: Ukraine Strikes Inside Russian Territory, Russians Say
entry.content: Ukrainian attack helicopters executed a predawn raid on Russian territory, a Russian official said, eluding air defenses to strike an oil depot near the border and signaling Kyiv’s ability to broaden the field of the war.

entry.title: Vladimir Putin's 20-Year March to War in Ukraine---and How the West Mishandled It
entry.content: Washington and the EU vacillated between engagement and deterrence. Meanwhile, the Russian leader became more isolated and more obsessed.

entry.title: Roman Abramovich's Abrupt Transformation From Shunned Oligarch to Wartime Envoy
entry.content: The Russian billionaire was recruited by a Ukrainian film producer to deliver messages directly to Vladimir Putin and to help the Ukrainians understand what he is thinking. Some Ukrainian officials have praised what they say is Mr. Abramovich’s constructive role in peace talks.
